item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Our Story

In the Yoga Studio, we are always dedicated to teach a better Yoga. We make sure that every member here get what they aimed for. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined.

item.title: Zakra Yoga - Front Page
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Flexibility & Yoga

Yoga not only increases your flexibility but also helps you on posture

JOIN THE AWESOMENESS

Welcome to Yoga Studio

The best place to learn yoga

In the Yoga Studio, we are always dedicated to teach a better Yoga. We make sure that every member here get what they aimed for.

Work Track

Top Instructors

Diet planning

GET AN APPOINTMENT LEARN MORE

Our Packages

Choose the best package for yourself.

Beginner

The perfect kick-start for the new comers. Get acces to the 5 classes per week.$45 / Month

Advanced Member

The perfect kick-start for the new comers. Get acces to the 5 classes per week.$45 / Month

Core Member

The perfect kick-start for the new comers. Get acces to the 5 classes per week.$99 / Month

Small progress is also a progress

No matter how small is your progress, it is always a progress. Start your yoga life from today.

GET AN APPOINTMENT

Our Lessons

Lessons specially designed for the special people

Personal

Private Lesson

This is not to discredit the idea that before laws, queens were only dryers. The snowstorms could be said to resemble sextan brackets.

Learn More

Balle

balleLesson

This is not to discredit the idea that before laws, queens were only dryers. The snowstorms could be said to resemble sextan brackets.

Learn More

Group

Learn More

Yoga Studio are doing some great work. I met the Studio in February and by the September I had already lost 20 pounds.

Maria Cena

Housewife

Advanced Member

This is not to discredit the idea that before laws, queens were only dryers. The snowstorms could be said to resemble sextan brackets.

Maria Cena

item.title: Testimonial
item.dc:creator: rabinstha.me@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
From Our Mat to Your Life

Lorem ipsum odor amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Placerat varius class himenaeos, porta suspendisse

Jack Wilson

"A Peaceful Escape"

"This studio has been a sanctuary for me. The classes are always welcoming, and I leave feeling refreshed and balanced every time."

Kate Henry

"A Transformative Experience"

"This studio has truly transformed my mind and body. The classes leave me feeling centered, energized, and more at peace. Im so grateful for this space!"
